title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 17.6 - Additional standard claim forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 17.6 - Additional standard claim forms

State Regulations

Standard claim forms for the services of other health care providers may be established by the superintendent upon a demonstration that such standard claim forms are required because existing claim forms fail to produce the desired efficiency in claim processing, and that additional standard claim forms will result in a more expeditious and economical settlement of claims. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
